TopicTitle: Request: Kerbal EVA group movement mod.

Articles.Content:
I would really like some sort of mod that made gave you the ability to control, move and kill entire groups of kerbal for i.e long excursions on foot without having to walk over every single kerbal. Because I lack the skill to make such a mod, I kindly ask if a mod developer can make such a tool. Thanks in advance.

PS: I know that this should be under 'requests', but for some reason I can't select a prefix.

It's called EVA Follower and you can find it here:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224333-evafollower

---

Features

  • Order kerbals around to follow you.
  • Make kerbals patrol around the area!
  • Patrol walking or running.

It's called EVA Follower and you can find it here:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224333-evafollower

---

Features

  • Order kerbals around to follow you.
  • Make kerbals patrol around the area!
  • Patrol walking or running.

Thank you!
